channel.title: ArangoDB Java driver on ArangoDB Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in ArangoDB Java driver on ArangoDB Documentation

item.title: ArangoDB Java Driver version 6
item.description: Version 6 reached End of Life (EOL) and is not actively developed anymore. Upgrading to version 7 is recommended. Repository: https://github.com/arangodb/arangodb-java-driver/tree/v6  Code examples  JavaDoc  (generated reference documentation) ChangeLog  Java VelocyPack  (JavaDoc ) Supported versions Only the latest version of this driver is maintained to support the most recent ArangoDB server features. It is compatible with all supported stable versions of ArangoDB server, see Product Support End-of-life Announcements . The minimum required Java version is 1.
